title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Centers                 Virginia Milepost   Humpback Rocks Visitor Center 5.8   James River Visitor Center 63.6   Peaks of Otter Visitor Center and Peaks of Otter Nature Center 85.9   Explore Park 115   Rocky Knob Contact Center (open weekends only) 169   Blue Ridge Music Center 213            North Carolina Visitor Centers Milepost   Moses Cone Manor House and Visitor Center 294   Linn Cove Visitor Center 304.4   Linville Falls Visitor Center 316.4   Museum of North Carolina Minerals 331   Craggy Gardens Visitor Center 364.5   Folk Art Center (Craft Guild information) 382   Blue Ridge Parkway Visitor Center 384.5   Waterrock Knob Visitor Center 451.2            Cultural Life Demonstrations Milepost   Humpback Mountain Farm 5.9   Mabry Mill 176.1   Brinegar Cabin 238.5         Most  visitor contact stations on the Parkway are seasonal, typically open from May through October. The Blue Ridge Parkway Visitor Center (MP 384), the Folk Art Center (MP 382) and the Museum of North Carolina Minerals (MP 331), are open year round and only closed on Thanksgiving, December 25th and January 1st.  Go to the full Operating Hours and Seasons page for more detailed information.
